channel.title: Pglet - Web UI framework for backend developers Blog

item.title: Launching Pglet
item.description: Today we are officially launching Pglet!

item.title: Introducing Pglet
item.description: Pglet (pronounced as "pagelet") empowers DevOps to easily add rich user interface into their internal apps and utilities without any knowledge of HTML, CSS and JavaScript.
